alert.note: Alert for Coastal Dixie; Coastal Taylor (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Coastal Flood Watch issued January 08 at 4:23AM EST until January 10 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY MORNING THROUGH WEDNESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Moderate coastal flooding possible. * WHERE...Coastal Taylor and Coastal Dixie Counties. * WHEN...From Tuesday morning through Wednesday morning. * IMPACTS...Two distinct coastal flood events could occur on Tuesday afternoon and again on Tuesday night around the time of high tide. Both events could cause numerous roads to flood and non elevated structures to be impacted by flood waters along the coast from Keaton Beach southward to Steinhatchee, Horseshoe Beach, and Suwannee.
info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property.
